item.title: Triple killer Kyle Clifford has been found guilty of raping his ex-girlfriend Louise Hunt, 25, before murdering her. He has already admitted shooting her and her sister Hannah Hunt, 28, with a crossbow and fatally stabbing their mother, 61-year-old Carol
